name: Bio Bots
description:
Bio Bots is a Free to play third-person team-based shooter.
Enjoy playing chaotic matches in different game-modes such as:

Capture the points
Secure the control points for your team until time runs out
Team-Deathmatch
No rules! 12 mins of pure chaos or peace...
Infinite Threat
Survive endless waves of zombies!
With the help of machinery to heal up, block shots, cause damage, or even to jump higher!

Features

-Multiple game-modes
-Offline & Online Co-op
-Multiple maps & weather options
-Leveling & Missions
-Character customization
-Items Market

Bio Bots is currently being developed by myself; using Unity game engine
